ygData.subject: Re: Re:  Pickled recipes
ygData.msgSnippet: As a Baker also I have to tell you that the recipes for Pickle anything is wrong. It should reat [type of meat] + Jug of Sauses + Vinger they don t need a jar
ygData.messageBody:
As a Baker also I have to tell you that the recipes for Pickle anything is
wrong.

It should reat [type of meat] + Jug of Sauses + Vinger

they don't need a jar (don't ask me where it come forom)

hope this answer your question

----- Original Message -----
From: "Danny Shaffer" <jdshaffer@...>
To: <EQ_Potters@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 7:38 AM
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Re: Pickled recipes


> From: "Danny Shaffer" <jdshaffer@...>
>
> I know this has nothing todo with pottery, but anyways, for the pickled
> gator, do you have to put the gator, vinegar etc in a spit, or can you
just
> use a public oven?
>
